Functions

om_ElementAttribSet

FUNCTION om_ElementAttribSet(p_elementID INTEGER, p_attrib STRING, p_value STRING)

Set attribute of an DomDoc element

 call om_ElementAttribSet(100, "color", "red")

Parameters:
p_elementID - Element ID of DomNode
p_attrib - Attribute of node
p_value - Value to set attribute to

om_ElementAttributeGet

FUNCTION om_ElementAttributeGet(p_elementID INTEGER, p_attrib STRING) RETURNING String

Get attribute of a DomDoc element

 define p_value string
 let p_value = om_ElementAttribGet(100, "color")

Parameters:
p_elementID - Element ID of a DomNode
p_attrib - Attribute of node
Returns:
Value of attribute

om_ElementCreate

FUNCTION om_ElementCreate(p_parentID INTEGER, p_tagName STRING) RETURNING integer

Creates a DomDoc element

 define p_nodeId integer
 let p_nodeId = om_ElementCreate(100, "StartMenuGroup")

Parameters:
p_parentID - Element ID of parent DomNode
p_tagName - Tagname of node to create
Returns:
Element ID of DomNode

om_ElementDelete

FUNCTION om_ElementDelete(p_parentID INTEGER)

Deletes a DomDoc element and its children

 call om_ElementDelete(100)

Parameters:
p_parentID - Element ID of parent DomNode

om_FormNode

FUNCTION om_FormNode(p_name STRING) RETURNING om.DomNode

Return the node for a form, defaults to current form

 define d_form om.DomNode
 let d_form = om_FormNode("customerForm")

Parameters:
p_name - Name of the form, NULL defaults to current form
Returns:
DomNode if found, otherwise NULL

om_NodeAttribGet

FUNCTION om_NodeAttribGet(d_parent om.DomNode, p_xpath STRING, p_attrib STRING) RETURNING String

Get attribute of first node that matches XPath query

 define d_root om.DomNode, p_hidden boolean, p_file string
 let d_root = om_WindowNode("w_customer")
 let p_hidden = om_NodeAttribGet(d_root, "//FormField[@name='id']", "hidden")
 let p_file = om_NodeAttribGet(NULL, "/UserInterface/StyleList", "fileName")

Parameters:
d_parent - DomNode of parent to search from, NULL defaults to root node of UI
p_xpath - XPath to node
p_attrib - Style attribute
Returns:
Attribute value of the Node

om_NodeAttribSet

FUNCTION om_NodeAttribSet(d_parent om.DomNode, p_xpath STRING, p_attrib STRING, p_value STRING)

Set attribute of nodes that match XPath query

 call om_NodeAttribSet(d_parent, p_xpath, p_attrib, p_value)

Parameters:
d_parent - DomNode of parent to search from, NULL defaults to root node of UI
p_xpath - XPath to node
p_attrib - Style attribute
p_value - Value to set attribute to

om_NodeFind

FUNCTION om_NodeFind(d_parent om.DomNode, p_tag STRING, p_attrib STRING, p_value STRING) RETURNING om.DomNode

Find first Node matching Tag and Attribute starting from a root Node

 define d_aui, d_node om.DomNode
 let d_aui = ui.Interface.getRootNode()
 let d_node = om_NodeFind(d_aui, "Form", "name", "custForm")

Parameters:
d_parent - DomNode of parent to search from, NULL defaults to root node of UI
p_tag - XML tag name
p_attrib - Attribute to match, typically name, text or colName
p_value - Matching value - can be metachar (wildcard) string
Returns:
DomNode if found, otherwise NULL

om_NodeListSelect

FUNCTION om_NodeListSelect(d_root om.DomNode, p_path STRING) RETURNING om.NodeList

Gets a NodeList matching an XPath query

 define d_win om.DomNode, d_list om.NodeList
 let d_win = om_WindowNode(NULL)
 let d_list = om_NodeListFind(d_win, "//MenuAction")
 let d_list = om_NodeListFind(NULL, "//Style")

Parameters:
d_root - Root node to search from, defaults to UI node
p_path - XPath expression
Returns:
NodeList matching the XPath expression

om_NodeSelect

FUNCTION om_NodeSelect(d_root om.DomNode, p_path STRING) RETURNING om.DomNode

Get first Node matching XPath query

 define d_win, d_menu om.DomNode
 let d_win = om_WindowNode("")
 let d_menu = om_NodeListFind(d_win, "//Form/TopMenu")
 let d_menu = om_NodeListFind(NULL, "//Window/Menu")

Parameters:
d_root - Root node to search from, defaults to UI node
p_path - XPath to node
Returns:
Returns first Node that matches the XPath expression

om_UInode

FUNCTION om_UInode() RETURNING om.DomNode

Returns the AUI (Abstract User Interface) root Node

 define d_aui om.DomNode
 let d_aui = om_UInode()

Returns:
Node for the AUI root

om_WindowNode

FUNCTION om_WindowNode(p_name STRING) RETURNING om.DomNode

Returns window Node by name, default is the Node for the current window

 define d_win om.DomNode
 let d_win = om_WindowNode("")
 let d_win = om_WindowNode("customer")

Parameters:
p_name - Name of the window, NULL defaults to current window
Returns:
DomNode if found, otherwise NULL
